name: Eighty/20 Results - Member Cancellation Policy for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Adds a membership level setting to configure how PMPro will handle membership cancellations.
sections.changelog: This change log contains information about the updates/modifications/fixes created for this add-on.
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website, where we try to respond within 1 business day.
